traits.description: Increases the chance of finding a health globe by 25% and you gain 100% additional Life from health globes.
traits.name: Pound of Flesh
traits.simpleDescription: "When the sky bleeds the crops grow tall, when our enemies bleed we grow strong." —Chant of the Harvest

traits.description:
Critical hit chance increased by 5%. Critical hit damage increased by 50%.

Many skills and runestone effects rely on critical hits to trigger their effects.
traits.name: Ruthless
traits.simpleDescription: The clans each paint their warriors in their own unique way. Some celebrate the mountain, others honor the fire, but the Targos clan worships the purifying virtue of pain.

traits.description: Your Armor is increased by 25% of your Vitality.
traits.name: Nerves Of Steel
traits.simpleDescription: "The trials begin with childhood; skinning ferocious beasts, climbing windswept cliffs and carrying weapons heavy enough to make a southern soldier weep. Is it any wonder that they never give ground?" —Sir Aric of Duncraig

traits.description:
Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:
Swords/Daggers: 15% increased damage
Maces/Axes: 10% chance to critical hit
Polearms/Spears: 10% attack speed
Mighty Weapons: 3 Fury per hit
traits.name: Weapons Master
traits.simpleDescription: "My men ambushed the traveler in the woods, but it was we who were surprised. Such keen senses, swift motions, flawless strikes. We never stood a chance." —Redjack the Bandit

traits.description:
The duration of your shouts is doubled. While benefiting from your War Cry or Battle Rage you regenerate 2% of your maximum Life per second.

Your shouts are:
Battle Rage
Threatning Shout
War Cry
traits.name: Inspiring Presence
traits.simpleDescription: "The enemy poured through the gap until Warmaster Karja impaled three demons at once on our battle standard, tossing their corpses into the fray below as she roared a rallying call from high atop the battlements." —The Battle of the Starless Night

traits.description: You inflict an additional 25% damage while at maximum Fury.
traits.name: Berserker Rage
traits.simpleDescription: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry." —Bannar the Berserker

traits.description: Gain 3% of all damage done as Life.
traits.name: Bloodthirst
traits.simpleDescription: "Compassion is weakness. To press the advantage when an opponent calls for mercy is the way of true power." —Halaberd the Conqueror

traits.description:
Increases Fury generation by 10% and maximum Fury is increased by 20.

Fury is used to fuel your most powerful attacks.
traits.name: Animosity
traits.simpleDescription: "While most orders teach the merits of calming the seas of the soul, the guardians of Arreat have embraced the raging inner storm." —Chronicler Arlavoc

traits.description: Reduces all non-physical damage by 20%. Whenever you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack you have a chance to gain 3 Fury.
traits.name: Superstition
traits.simpleDescription: "The sorcery of the west has brought us nothing but blight. Strength built these walls, and strength will hold them." —Gruchac Hammerhand

traits.description:
Increases Armor by 50%.
Thorns damage dealt increased by 50%.
traits.name: Tough as Nails
traits.simpleDescription: After a while the scars serve as their own layer of armor.

traits.description: Increases the damage of Ancient Spear and Weapon Throw by 10%. In addition, a critical hit with Ancient Spear automatically resets the cooldown and critical hits with Weapon Throw have a chance to return 14 Fury.
traits.name: No Escape
traits.simpleDescription: "Run if you must, but you'll only die tired." —Ooron Goons

traits.description: While below 20% Life, all skills cost no Fury and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
traits.name: Relentless
traits.simpleDescription: No matter the odds some warriors simply refuse to fall.

traits.description: As long as there are 3 enemies within 8 yards, all of your damage is increased by 30%.
traits.name: Brawler
traits.simpleDescription: "I have two blades, one for each of you." —Blademaster Kharne

traits.description: The duration of control impairing effects on you are reduced by 20%. In addition, whenever you become stunned, feared or charmed you have a chance to recover 15% of your maximum Life.
traits.name: Juggernaut
traits.simpleDescription: "I swear to you, we put a dozen arrows into him and he just stood back up. These so-called barbarians, these madmen of the north—there is no stopping them." —Soldier of Bastion's Keep

traits.description: You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you gain 1 Fury every 2 seconds.
traits.name: Unforgiving
traits.simpleDescription: "It was as if he suddenly came to know every grievous injury endured by his ancestors, and he had selected that very moment to exact their collective revenge." —Chronicler Arlavoc

traits.description: The cooldown on your Earthquake, Call of the Ancients and Wrath of the Berserker skills is reduced by 30 seconds.
traits.name: Boon of Bul-Kathos
traits.simpleDescription: The aid of the Immortal King shall come to those who have earned it.

runes.name: Instigation
runes.description: Generate 6 additional Fury per attack.
runes.simpleDescription: Generate additional Fury with each attack.

runes.name: Onslaught
runes.description: Add 2 reverberations that cause 22% weapon damage per strike. Removes the chance for Knockback.
runes.simpleDescription: Deal extra damage at the expense of knocking enemies back.

runes.name: Clobber
runes.description: Instead of Knockback, each hit has a 20% chance to Stun the target for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Each hit has a chance to Stun enemies instead of Knockback.

runes.name: Punish
runes.description: Each attack increases the damage of all of your skills by 6% for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
runes.simpleDescription: Using Bash increases the damage of all your skills for a short time.

runes.name: Pulverize
runes.description: Cause a shockwave that inflicts 38% weapon damage to enemies in a 26 yard line behind the targeted enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Hit with such force that it creates a shockwave that damages all enemies in its path.

skills.name: Bash
skills.description:
Generate: 6 Fury per attack

Brutally smash an enemy for 150% weapon damage with a 20% chance for Knockback.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 6 Fury per attack

Brutally strike a single enemy with a chance for Knockback.

runes.name: Rolling Thunder
runes.description: Create a shockwave that deals 155% weapon damage to all enemies within 22 yards in front of you.
runes.simpleDescription: Unleash a shockwave from the point of impact.

runes.name: Smash
runes.description: Strike a smaller area for 270% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Strike a smaller area for additional damage.

runes.name: The Devil's Anvil
runes.description: Create a tremor at the point of impact for 2 seconds that slows the movement speed of enemies by 60%.
runes.simpleDescription: Create a tremor that causes additional damage and slows enemies.

runes.name: Thunderstrike
runes.description: Whenever you kill an enemy with Hammer of the Ancients every other nearby enemy is stunned for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Every kill with the Hammer of the Ancients stuns nearby enemies.

runes.name: Birthright
runes.description: Critical Hits have a 10% chance to cause enemies to drop treasure or health globes.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits may cause enemies to drop treasure.

skills.name: Hammer of the Ancients
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

Call forth a massive hammer to smash enemies directly in front of you for 200% weapon damage. Hammer of the Ancients has a 15% increased chance to Critical Hit.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Call down a mystical hammer and smash groups of enemies.

runes.name: Rupture
runes.description: Enemies slain by Cleave explode, causing 110% weapon damage to all other enemies within 8 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies slain by Cleave explode.

runes.name: Reaping Swing
runes.description: Generate 3 Fury per enemy hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Generate additional Fury with each swing.

runes.name: Scattering Blast
runes.description: On Critical Hits, knock enemies back 14 yards and inflict 60% weapon damage to enemies where they land.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits have a chance for Knockback and cause additional damage where they land.

runes.name: Broad Sweep
runes.description: Increase damage to 156% weapon damage to enemies caught in the swing.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage caused by Cleave.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.description: Enemies cleaved have their movement speed reduced by 80% for 1 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: A whirling attack that slows enemies' movement.

skills.name: Cleave
skills.description:
Generate: 5 Fury per attack

Swing your weapon in a wide arc to deal 120% weapon damage to all enemies caught in the swing.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 5 Fury per attack

Swing your weapon in an arc and strike multiple enemies.

runes.name: Grim Harvest
runes.description: Enemies are badly shaken and have a 5% chance to drop additional treasure.
runes.simpleDescription: Creates a chance that threatened enemies will drop treasure.

runes.name: Falter
runes.description: Affected enemies also have their attack speed reduced by 15% for 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the attack speed of threatened enemies.

runes.name: Intimidate
runes.description: Affected enemies also have their movement speed reduced by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Slow threatened enemies.

runes.name: Demoralize
runes.description: Affected enemies are also taunted to attack you for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Taunt enemies into attacking you.

runes.name: Terrify
runes.description: Enemies are severely demoralized. Each enemy has a 20% chance to flee for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Cause threatened enemies to flee.

skills.name: Threatening Shout
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

Shout with great ferocity, reducing damage done by enemies within 25 yards by 25% for 15 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Strike fear in your enemies and make their attacks do less damage.

runes.name: Ravage
runes.description: Increase the range of Rend to hit all enemies within 14 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the range of Rend.

runes.name: Blood Lust
runes.description: Gain 6% of the damage done by Rend as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life when you damage enemies with Rend.

runes.name: Lacerate
runes.description: Increase damage to 90% weapon damage as Physical every second for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of Rend.

runes.name: Mutilate
runes.description: Increase bleeding duration to 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the bleeding duration of Rend.

runes.name: Bloodbath
runes.description: Enemies killed while bleeding cause all enemies within 10 yards to begin bleeding for 60% weapon damage as Physical over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Killing enemies with Rend causes nearby enemies to bleed.

skills.name: Rend
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

A sweeping strike causes all nearby enemies to bleed for 210% weapon damage as Physical over 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Wound nearby enemies and cause them to bleed for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Deafening Crash
runes.description: Enemies in the area have their movement speed slowed by 60% for 3 seconds after they recover from being stunned.
runes.simpleDescription: Slow enemy movement when using Ground Stomp.

runes.name: Wrenching Smash
runes.description: Increase the area of effect to 24 yards. Enemies are pulled closer before the strike lands.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the area of effect of Ground Stomp and pull enemies towards you.

runes.name: Foot of the Mountain
runes.description: Increase Fury gained to 30.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase Fury generation of Ground Stomp.

runes.name: Trembling Stomp
runes.description: Enemies in the area also take 75% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage enemies affected by Ground Stomp.

runes.name: Avalanche
runes.description: Enemies are knocked back 12 yards and inflict 55% weapon damage to enemies in the landing area.
runes.simpleDescription: Knockback enemies affected by Ground Stomp.

skills.name: Ground Stomp
skills.description:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Smash the ground, stunning all enemies within 12 yards for 4 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 12 seconds

Smash the ground and stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Death from Above
runes.description: Land with such force that enemies have a 50% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Stun enemies at the point of impact

runes.name: Call of Arreat
runes.description: Shockwaves burst forth from the ground increasing the radius of effect to 16 yards and pulling affected enemies towards you.
runes.simpleDescription: Draw enemies towards you when you land.

runes.name: Toppling Impact
runes.description: Send enemies hurtling 20 yards into other nearby enemies who suffer 15% weapon damage and are pushed back in a chain up to 2 times.
runes.simpleDescription: Send enemies hurtling towards other nearby enemies.

runes.name: Launch
runes.description: Jump into the air with such great force that enemies within 8 yards of the origin of the jump take 75% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage enemies near your as you leap into the air.

runes.name: Iron Impact
runes.description: Gain 300% additional Armor for 4 seconds after landing.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your Armor for a limited time after landing.

skills.name: Leap Attack
skills.description:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Leap into the air, dealing 125% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards of your destination.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Leap towards enemies and attack them.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.description: Killing an enemy with Frenzy heals you for 12% of your maximum Life over 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Killing an enemy while frenzied heals you.

runes.name: Maniac
runes.description: Each Frenzy effect also increases your damage by 4%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase damage dealt while frenzied.

runes.name: Smite
runes.description: Add a 20% chance to call down a bolt of lightning from above, stunning your target for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Chance to call down a bolt of lightning that stuns enemies.

runes.name: Sidearm
runes.description: Each strike has a 25% chance to throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy that deals 110% weapon damage to all enemies in its path.
runes.simpleDescription: Each attack while frenzied has a chance to trigger an axe throw.

runes.name: Relentless
runes.description: While under the effects of Frenzy, you gain 15% increased movement speed.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your movement speed while frenzied.

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.description:
Generate: 3 Fury per attack

Swing for 110% weapon damage. Frenzy attack speed increases by 15% with each swing. This effect can stack up to 5 times for a total bonus of 75% attack speed.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 3 Fury per attack

Enter a frenzied state that increases your attack speed with each hit.

runes.name: Ferocity
runes.description: While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have a chance to increase the duration of Battle Rage by 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits have a chance of increasing the duration of Battle Rage.

runes.name: Swords to Ploughshares
runes.description: While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have up to a 5% chance to cause enemies to drop additional health globes.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits increase the chance of enemies dropping health globes.

runes.name: Into the Fray
runes.description: While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have a chance to generate 15 additional Fury.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits have a chance to generate Fury.

runes.name: Marauder's Rage
runes.description: Increase damage bonus to 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage bonus of Battle Rage.

runes.name: Bloodshed
runes.description: While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have a chance to cause an explosion of blood dealing 20% of the damage done to all other nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits have a chance to cause the target to explode, damaging nearby enemies.

skills.name: Battle Rage
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

Enter a rage which increases damage by 15% and critical hit chance by 3% for 30 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Unleash your inner rage, increasing your damage for 30 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty Throw
runes.description: Increase thrown weapon damage to 188% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of Weapon Throw.

runes.name: Ricochet
runes.description: Cause the weapon to ricochet and hit up to 3 targets within 20 yards of each other.
runes.simpleDescription: Strike multiple enemies with one throw.

runes.name: Throwing Hammer
runes.description: Hurl a hammer with a 75% chance to stun the target for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Hurl a hammer that can Stun an enemy.

runes.name: Stupefy
runes.description: Aim for the head, gaining a 20% chance of causing your target to be confused and attack other enemies for 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Aim for the head and cause the target to attack its allies.

runes.name: Dread Bomb
runes.description: Expend all remaining Fury to throw a corpse which inflicts an additional 3% weapon damage for each point of Fury expended to all enemies within 12 yards of the target.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw a corpse at nearby enemies.

skills.name: Weapon Throw
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Fury

Hurl a throwing weapon at an enemy for 145% weapon damage and slow the movement of the enemy by 60% for 2 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Fury

Hurl a mighty axe that damages and slows its target.

runes.name: Rush
runes.description: Increase dodge chance by 12% while sprinting.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your ability to Dodge.

runes.name: Run Like the Wind
runes.description: Tornadoes rage in the wake of the Sprint, each one inflicting 60% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Create tornadoes in your wake that damage enemies.

runes.name: Marathon
runes.description: Increases the movement speed bonus to 50% for 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the movement boost from Sprint.

runes.name: Gangway
runes.description: Slams through enemies, knocking them back and inflicting 25% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Slam through enemies in your path causing Knockback.

runes.name: Forced March
runes.description: Increase the movement speed of allies within 30 yards by 20% for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the movement speed of your allies.

skills.name: Sprint
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

Increase movement speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Run furiously fast for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Revel
runes.description: Heal 7% of your maximum Life for every enemy hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Life with each hit.

runes.name: Killing Spree
runes.description: Your chance to Critical Hit is increased by 10% for 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your Critical Hit chance.

runes.name: Storm of Steel
runes.description: Throw up to 3 axes at nearby enemies which inflict 50% weapon damage each.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw multiple axes at nearby enemies when overpower is activated.

runes.name: Momentum
runes.description: Overpower generates 12 Fury for every enemy hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain additional Fury when using Overpower.

runes.name: Crushing Advance
runes.description: Reflect 30% of incoming melee damage for 6 seconds after Overpower is activated.
runes.simpleDescription: Reflect incoming damage back to the attacker.

skills.name: Overpower
skills.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Deal 260% weapon damage to all targets within 9 yards. If Overpower critical hits, the cooldown is automatically reset.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Unleash a devastating attack against nearby enemies.

Cooldown is automatically reset if Overpower causes a Critical Hit.

runes.name: Giant's Stride
runes.description: Secondary tremors follow your movement and inflict 65% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: The ground shakes as you move, leaving fire in your wake.

runes.name: Chilling Earth
runes.description: Creates an icy patch causing Earthquake's damage to turn Cold and slow the movement of enemies by 80%.
runes.simpleDescription: Freeze the ground and slow enemies.

runes.name: The Mountain's Call
runes.description: Removes the Fury cost and reduces the cooldown to 105 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Removes the Fury cost and reduces the cooldown of Earthquake.

runes.name: Aftershocks
runes.description: Secondary tremors knock enemies back and inflict 65% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Additional tremors knock enemies back and inflict Fire damage.

runes.name: Path of Fire
runes.description: Project secondary tremors up to 12 yards ahead of you that inflict 65% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Project shockwaves directly in front of you.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description:
Cost: 50 Fury
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Shake the ground violently, dealing 1600% weapon damage as Fire over 8 seconds to all enemies within 18 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Fury
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Violent tremors shake the earth and damage nearby enemies.

runes.name: Stagger
runes.description: Add a 70% chance of stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Add a chance to Stun affected enemies.

runes.name: Shattered Ground
runes.description: Increase damage to 202% weapon damage and increases the knockback by 100%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage and Knockback of Seismic Slam.

runes.name: Rumble
runes.description: The ground continues to shudder after the intitial strike, damaging enemies in the area for 30% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Extend the duration of Seismic Slam and its effects.

runes.name: Strength from Earth
runes.description: Reduce Fury cost to 15 Fury.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Fury cost of Seismic Slam.

runes.name: Cracking Rift
runes.description: Focus the seismic shockwaves along a narrow path to inflict 255% weapon damage to targets along a 42 yard path.
runes.simpleDescription: Create a focused shockwave that does more damage.

skills.name: Seismic Slam
skills.description:
Cost: 30 Fury

Slam the ground to cause a wave of destruction that deals 155% weapon damage and knockback to targets in a 45 yard arc.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Fury

Create shockwaves that damage enemies in their path.

runes.name: Battering Ram
runes.description: Increase damage at the destination to 283% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage you deal when charging.

runes.name: Merciless Assault
runes.description: Cooldown is reduced by 2 second for every target hit. This effect can reduce the cooldown by up to 10 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Each enemy charged reduces the cooldown of Furious Charge.

runes.name: Stamina
runes.description: Generate 8 Fury for each target hit while charging.
runes.simpleDescription: Generate Fury for each enemy you charge.

runes.name: Bull Rush
runes.description: Any targets who are critically hit by Furious Charge will be stunned for 2.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Each target you charge has a chance to be stunned.

runes.name: Juggernaut
runes.description: Regain 6% of your maximum Life for each target hit by Furious Charge.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Life for each target you charge.

skills.name: Furious Charge
skills.description:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Rush forward knocking back enemies and inflicting 195% weapon damage to enemies along the path of the charge.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charge all enemies in your path and knock them back.

runes.name: Hardened Wrath
runes.description: Increases the Armor bonus to 100%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the Armor bonus of War Cry.

runes.name: Charge!
runes.description: Increases Fury gained to 60.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase Fury generation.

runes.name: Invigorate
runes.description: Increases maximum Life by 10% and regenerates 890 Life per second while affected by War Cry.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your maximum Life and regenerate Life while War Cry is active.

runes.name: Veteran's Warning
runes.description: War Cry also grants 15% dodge bonus.
runes.simpleDescription: War Cry grants a bonus to Dodge.

runes.name: Impunity
runes.description: All of your resistances are increased by 50% while affected by War Cry.
runes.simpleDescription: War Cry increases your ability to resist damage of all types.

skills.name: War Cry
skills.description:
Generate: 30 Fury
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Unleash a rallying cry to increase Armor for you and all allies within 30 yards by 50% for 60 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 30 Fury
Cooldown: 30 seconds

A rallying cry increases Armor for you and your allies for 60 seconds.

runes.name: Bravado
runes.description: When activated, knockback all enemies within 12 yards and deal 50% weapon damage to them.
runes.simpleDescription: Knockback nearby enemies when using Ignore Pain.

runes.name: Iron Hide
runes.description: Increases duration to 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of Ignore Pain.

runes.name: Ignorance is Bliss
runes.description: While Ignore Pain is active, gain 20% of all damage dealt as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: While Ignore Pain is active, gain Life for damage dealt to enemies.

runes.name: Mob Rule
runes.description: Extend the effect to nearby allies, reducing damage taken by 65% for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Allies benefit from the effects of Ignore Pain.

runes.name: Contempt for Weakness
runes.description: Reflects 50% of ignored damage back at the enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Redirect a portion of the damage back to the attacker.

skills.name: Ignore Pain
skills.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Reduces all damage taken by 65% for 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Your rage protects you from most damage for a limited time.

runes.name: Vengeance is Mine
runes.description: Gain 5 Fury each time Revenge is used and improve Life gained from each enemy hit to 7.5%.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain additional Fury and Life when Revenge is used.

runes.name: Best Served Cold
runes.description: After using Revenge, your critical strike chance is increased by 10% for 12 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Revenge increases your Critical Hit chance.

runes.name: Retribution
runes.description: Increase damage to 286% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of Revenge.

runes.name: Grudge
runes.description: Knocks enemies back 24 yards whenever Revenge is used.
runes.simpleDescription: Revenge causes Knockback.

runes.name: Provocation
runes.description: Increases the chance Revenge will become active to 30% each time you are hit by an attack.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the chance for Revenge to become active.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description:
Revenge has a 15% chance to become active each time you are hit.

Inflict 220% weapon damage to all nearby enemies. You heal 5.0% of your maximum Life for each enemy hit.
skills.simpleDescription:
Unleash a retaliatory attack that heals you with each strike.

Revenge has a chance to become available when you are hit.

runes.name: The Council Rises
runes.description: The Ancients inflict 66% weapon damage with each attack and have 100% additional armor.
runes.simpleDescription: The Ancients inflict additional damage and have increased Armor.

runes.name: Duty to the Clan
runes.description: Increase duration to 20 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of Call of the Ancients.

runes.name: Korlic's Might
runes.description: Korlic gains the skill Furious Charge which deals 200% of your weapon damage to all enemies in a line.
runes.simpleDescription: Korlic, the first of the Ancients, gains the Furious Charge skill.

runes.name: Madawc's Madness
runes.description: Madawc gains the skill Seismic Slam which deals 180% of your weapon damage to enemies in an arc.
runes.simpleDescription: Madawc, the second of the Ancients, gains the Seismic Slam skill.

runes.name: Talic's Anger
runes.description: Talic gains the skill Leap Attack which deals 250% of your weapon damage to enemies in the area of the leap.
runes.simpleDescription: Talic, the third of the Ancients, gains the Leap Attack skill.

skills.name: Call of the Ancients
skills.description:
Cost: 50 Fury
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon the ancient barbarians Talic, Korlic, and Madawc to fight alongside you for 15 seconds. Each deals 60% weapon damage per swing in addition to bonus abilities.

Talic wields a sword and shield and uses the Whirlwind skill.
Korlic wields a massive polearm and uses the Cleave skill.
Madawc dual-wields axes and uses the Weapon Throw skill.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Fury
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon three ancestral heroes to fight alongside you for 15 seconds.

runes.name: Dust Devils
runes.description: Generate harsh tornadoes that inflict 40% weapon damage to enemies in their path.
runes.simpleDescription: Secondary tornadoes follow in your wake and damage enemies they cross.

runes.name: Hurricane
runes.description: Increases your movement speed during Whirlwind to your full run speed.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the movement speed of Whirlwind.

runes.name: Blood Funnel
runes.description: Critical strikes restore 0.5% of your maximum Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits caused while using Whirlwind restore Life.

runes.name: Eye of the Storm
runes.description: Every enemy hit refunds 1 Fury.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Fury for every enemy hit.

runes.name: Volcanic Eruption
runes.description: Turns Whirlwind into a torrent of magma that inflicts 130% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Create whirlwinds of magma and fire that burn enemies.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description:
Cost: 16 Fury

Deliver multiple attacks to everything in your path for 100% weapon damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 16 Fury

Unleash a series of whirling attacks damaging everything in your path.

runes.name: Grappling Hooks
runes.description: Throw 3 spears. Each spear will pull back the enemy that it hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw multiple spears that pull enemies towards you.

runes.name: Skirmish
runes.description: Increases Fury gained to 30.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase Fury generation.

runes.name: Dread Spear
runes.description: Gain Life equal to 60% of the damage inflicted.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage dealt with Ancient Spear heals you.

runes.name: Harpoon
runes.description: Pierce through multiple enemies in a straight line and drag them all back.
runes.simpleDescription: Pierce additional enemies and pull them towards you.

runes.name: Rage Flip
runes.description: Enemies hit with Ancient Spear are pulled in the opposite direction and damage is increased to 213% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies are pulled in the opposite direction and take additional damage.

skills.name: Ancient Spear
skills.description:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Throw a spear to pull an enemy back to you, briefly slowing the target's movement by 60% and dealing 185% weapon damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 15 Fury
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Throw a spear at an enemy and pull them towards you.

runes.name: Arreat's Wail
runes.description: Activating Wrath of the Berserker knocks back all enemies within 12 yards and deals 430% weapon damage to them.
runes.simpleDescription: Entering Wrath of the Berserker knocks enemies back.

runes.name: Insanity
runes.description: While active your damage is also increased by 100%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your damage while Wrath of the Berserker is active.

runes.name: Slaughter
runes.description: Landing a critical hit while Wrath of the Berserker is active has a chance to cause an explosion of blood dealing 155% weapon damage to all enemies within 15 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical hits cause enemies to erupt and damage nearby enemies.

runes.name: Striding Giant
runes.description: Increase the bonus dodge chance granted to 60%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your chance to Dodge attacks.

runes.name: Thrive on Chaos
runes.description: Every 25 Fury gained while Wrath of the Berserker is active adds 1 second to the duration of the effect.
runes.simpleDescription: Fury gained increases the duration of Wrath of the Berserker.

skills.name: Wrath of the Berserker
skills.description:
Cost: 50 Fury
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Enter a berserker rage which raises several attributes for 15 seconds.

Critical Hit: 10%
Attack Speed: 25%
Dodge Chance: 20%
Movement Speed: 20%
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Fury
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Become fury incarnate for 15 seconds.
